mapper.sql: pid, rectime, numbers, title, Spishi, Wpishi, deadline, IsDone, phone, direction
mapper.insert: insert into pswj (pid, rectime, numbers, title, Spishi, Wpishi, deadline, IsDone, phone, direction) values (#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rectime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numbers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spishi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpishi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update pswj
rectime = #{rectime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
numbers = #{numbers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Spishi = #{spishi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Wpishi = #{wpishi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE},
IsDone = #{isdone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
